author: Naomi O’Leary
title: Governments across Europe examining how to exit lockdown
description: EU to announce guidelines, including recommendations for states sharing borders
content:
Governments across Europe are examining how to ease out of lockdowns imposed to curb the spread of coronavirus while minimising the risks of new outbreaks.
Austria, France and Denmark have announced plans to gradually reopen some schools, shops and businesse… [+14332 chars]
